body_html:
In 2) I wanted to do the "permute + view if possible" and would need to have a way to decide "if possible".
Re 4): I didn't try yet to generalise the backward. Unfortunately, it is not automatic due to the 1-dimensional reduction being replaced for the jit signature thing. The backwards seem to be very different between sum and product, so they seem harder to generalise using a template.

body:
In 2) I wanted to do the "permute + view if possible" and would need to have a way to decide "if possible".
Re 4): I didn't try yet to generalise the backward. Unfortunately, it is not automatic due to the 1-dimensional reduction being replaced for the jit signature thing. The backwards seem to be very different between sum and product, so they seem harder to generalise using a template.
